game.title: The Quest for the Amulet
game.objective: Recover the Amulet of Power and present it to Queen Regalia
game.description: A perilous quest awaits you, my brave adventurer. The Amulet of Power has been misplaced in an ancient castle hidden within the mountains. Your objective is to uncover its whereabouts and return it to the queen's hands.

task.objective: Examine the castle's east wing for hidden clues
task.description: Come across a crypt in the east wing that seems out of place. Uncover the secret door within to proceed.

task.objective: Find the Amulet's Map in the library
task.description: The map to the inner chamber is likely hidden among the ancient tomes in the castle's library. Be cautious of wandering ghosts.

task.objective: Battle the Dragon Guardian in the inner sanctum
task.description: A fierce dragon guards the amulet's chamber. Bravery and cunning are required to defeat it.
